title: How Can I Save Power?
answer:
1、When you are not using the phone, press the power key to turn off the screen.
2、On the main menu screen, select Settings > Display > Screen timeout to shorten the delay before the screen of your phone is turned off automatically.
3、On the main menu screen, select > Settings > Display > Brightness to decrease the brightness of the screen.
4、On the main menu screen, select Settings > Wireless & networks, and then deselect WLAN and Bluetooth to turn off the WLAN and Bluetooth functions.
5、On the main menu screen, select Settings > Accounts & sync, and then deselect Background data and Auto-sync to disable background data synchronization.
6、On the main menu screen, select Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks, and then deselect Data enabled to disable the data service.
7、On the main menu screen, select Settings > Location & security, and then deselect Use GPS satellites to disable the Global Positioning System (GPS) function.
